    • Constructor Detail

      • DevCardFacade

        public DevCardFacade(@NotNull
                     FacadeManager manager)
        Constructor. Requires a valid game model to work. Also sets the resourcesFacade so that the useYearOfPlentyCard(Player, ResourceType, ResourceType) can give the player two resource cards
        Parameters:
        manager - the manager to use, not null
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if model is null
        Precondition:
        model is a valid ClientModel.
        Postcondition:
        This provides valid operations on model.

    • Method Detail

      • canBuyDevCard

        public boolean canBuyDevCard(Player currentPlayer)
        Checks if the currentPlayer can buy a development card. The resources needed are one ore, wool, and grain
        Parameters:
        currentPlayer - The player who is buying the development card during their turn
        Returns:
        True if currentPlayer can buy a development card, False if not
        Precondition:
        The currentPlayer calls this method when they want to buy a development card. currentPlayer is part of the current ClientModel TurnStatus.PLAYING is the turn status. It is the currentPlayer turn. There is at least one development card available
        Postcondition:
        None.

      • buyDevCard

        public void buyDevCard(@NotNull
                       Player currentPlayer)
        The currentPlayer buys a random development card and returns the required resources to the bank or deck.
        Parameters:
        currentPlayer - The player who is buying the development card during their turn.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Precondition:
        The currentPlayer calls this method during their turn when they want to buy a development card. The method canBuyDevCard(Player) returns a true statement.
        Postcondition:
        The currentPlayer gets a random development card

      • canUseSoldierCard

        public boolean canUseSoldierCard(Player currentPlayer)
        The currentPlayer attempts to use the Soldier development card
        Parameters:
        currentPlayer - The Player who is using their development card during their turn.
        Returns:
        true if the currentPlayer can use the Soldier card. False if not
        Precondition:
        This method is called by the controller when the card to be used is a Soldier card currentPlayer is part of the current ClientModel TurnStatus.PLAYING is the turn status. It is the currentPlayer turn.
        Postcondition:
        None.

      • useSoldierCard

        public void useSoldierCard(@NotNull
                           Player currentPlayer)
        The currentPlayer uses the Soldier development card
        Parameters:
        currentPlayer - The player who is using their development card during their turn.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Precondition:
        This method is called by the controller when the card to be used is a Soldier card currentPlayer is part of the current ClientModel canUseSoldierCard(Player) returns a true statement
        Postcondition:
        The robber is activated The card cannot be reused for the rest of the game If applicable, the currentPlayer gets the Largest Army card

      • canUseVictoryPointCards

        public boolean canUseVictoryPointCards(Player currentPlayer)
        Can the player play monument cards?

        According to the spec (but not the rules), Monument cards are played immediately.

        Parameters:
        currentPlayer - The player who is using their development card during their turn.
        Returns:
        True if the total victory point count is 10 (or more), False otherwise
        Precondition:
        This method is called by the controller when the card to be used is a Victory Point card currentPlayer is part of the current ClientModel TurnStatus.PLAYING is the turn status. It is the currentPlayer turn.
        Postcondition:
        None.

      • useVictoryPointCards

        public void useVictoryPointCards(@NotNull
                                 Player currentPlayer)
        The currentPlayer uses all of their the Victory Point development cards. This can only be played when the currentPlayer's total victory points equal 10, including unplayed victory point cards
        Parameters:
        currentPlayer - The player who is using their development card during their turn.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Precondition:
        This method is called by the controller when the card to be used is a Victory Point card currentPlayer is part of the current ClientModel The method canUseVictoryPointCards(Player) returns a true statement
        Postcondition:
        Played victory point cards add points to the currentPlayer's visible victory point count The card cannot be reused for the rest of the game

      • canUseRoadBuildingCard

        public boolean canUseRoadBuildingCard(Player currentPlayer)
        This method checks if the currentPlayer have 2 roads that are not placed on the map.
        Parameters:
        currentPlayer - The player who is using their development card during their turn.
        Returns:
        True if the currentPlayer has 2 roads that are not placed on the map, False otherwise
        Precondition:
        This method is called by the controller when the card to be used is a Road Building card. currentPlayer is part of the current ClientModel
        Postcondition:
        None.

      • useRoadBuildingCard

        public void useRoadBuildingCard(@NotNull
                                Player currentPlayer)
        The currentPlayer uses the Road Building development card. The currentPlayer places 2 roads down
        Parameters:
        currentPlayer - The player who is using their development card during their turn.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Precondition:
        This method is called by the controller when the card to be used is a Road Building card currentPlayer is part of the current ClientModel The method canUseRoadBuildingCard(Player) returns a true statement.
        Postcondition:
        Place 2 roads on the map according to the rules of placing roads The card is discarded and cannot be used for the rest of the game If applicable, the currentPlayer gets the Longest Road card

      • canUseYearOfPlentyCard

        public boolean canUseYearOfPlentyCard(Player currentPlayer,
                                      ResourceType resourceType1,
                                      ResourceType resourceType2)
        Are the requested resourceType1 and resourceType2 available to draw?
        Parameters:
        currentPlayer - The player who is using their development card during their turn.
        resourceType1 - The first resource desired by the currentPlayer
        resourceType2 - The second resource desired by the currentPlayer
        Returns:
        True if both resourceType1 and resourceType2 are available, False if not
        Precondition:
        This method is called by the controller when the card to be used is a Year of Plenty card currentPlayer is part of the current ClientModel resourceType1 and resourceType2 are not null
        Postcondition:
        None.

      • useYearOfPlentyCard

        public void useYearOfPlentyCard(@NotNull
                                Player currentPlayer,
                                @NotNull
                                ResourceType resourceType1,
                                @NotNull
                                ResourceType resourceType2)
        The currentPlayer uses the Year of Plenty development card. The currentPlayer draws 2 resources of the currentPlayer's choice
        Parameters:
        currentPlayer - The player who is using their development card during their turn.
        resourceType1 - The first resource desired by the currentPlayer
        resourceType2 - The second resource desired by the currentPlayer
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Precondition:
        This method is called by the controller when the card to be used is a Year of Plenty card currentPlayer is part of the current ClientModel resourceType1 and resourceType2 are valid ResourceType The method canUseYearOfPlentyCard(Player, ResourceType, ResourceType) returns a true statement
        Postcondition:
        Draw 2 resource cards of the currentPlayer's choice, as long as the cards are available The card is discarded and cannot be used for the rest of the game

      • canUseMonopolyCard

        public boolean canUseMonopolyCard(Player currentPlayer,
                                  ResourceType monopolyType)
        The currentPlayer tries to use the Monopoly development card.
        Parameters:
        currentPlayer - The player who is using their development card during their turn.
        monopolyType - The resource type that the currentPlayer wants
        Returns:
        true if the Monopoly card can be used; False if not
        Precondition:
        This method is called by the controller when the card to be used is a Monopoly card currentPlayer is part of the current ClientModel monopolyType is valid ResourceType
        Postcondition:
        None.

      • useMonopolyCard

        public void useMonopolyCard(@NotNull
                            Player currentPlayer,
                            @NotNull
                            ResourceType monopolyType)
        The currentPlayer uses the Monopoly development card. The currentPlayer declares one resource card and all other players give the currentPlayer all resources of that same resource
        Parameters:
        currentPlayer - The player who is using their development card during their turn.
        monopolyType - The resource type that the currentPlayer wants
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Precondition:
        This method is called by the controller when the card to be used is a Monopoly card currentPlayer is part of the current ClientModel monopolyType is valid ResourceType canUseMonopolyCard(Player, ResourceType) returns a true statement
        Postcondition:
        The currentPlayer declares one resource card and all other players give the currentPlayer all resources of that same resource type The card is discarded and cannot be used for the rest of the game
